topics.body:
"@Carcass Strife":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5560b5c86368721d2b0d0900#post_5560b5c86368721d2b0d0900
I hear stuff like that is common in mobile games. Hell Gameloft one of the most succesful mobile gaming companies, makes a lot of mockbuster games even the MLP game is one.
At least some of the artwork in their games are cute.

But yeah I am suprised nintendo didn't sue them yet.
Here is some more of their "original" advertising.
!https://40.media.tumblr.com/b9bd4f73d077c9df48f59f2fcc126b51/tumblr_nmxlp6S1O51u1dyjno1_500.png!
You just got to love how their tagline is basically admitting they just want to leech off of pokemon and WOW since the best thing they can come up with for advertising is comparing it to popular franchises.

Edit:And apparently the gameplay itself rips off Puzzles and Dragons which is a much better game that doesn't resort to blatent plagerism.
